channel.title: 4 Social classes
channel.description:
None of these ideas are completely original.
Purpose: Dead manipulation. Physician won't be changed. > [color = "blue"]**Priest**[/color] - Blue Dragon Social (Unique) >Passive 1: Call the dead - Speak to the dead at night. >Passive 2: Devoted - Night immune once > > Day Ability 1: Summon - Select a dead player's soul to utilize next night. You can only utilize each player once. You cannot utilize Killer or Special type classes. (Unlimited) > > Night Ability: Chanelling - Use the summoned players first night Ability. (Unlimited)
>[color = "purple"]**Soulcatcher**[/color] - Unseen Social (Unique) >Passive 1: Call the darkness - Dead Unseen can talk to the living Unseen at night. > Passive 2: Consume soul - If you would die at night. Instead consume a soul and survive > > Day Ability 1: Invade - Consume 3 soul's and make 1 person hear someone else say something. They will not hear anything else that person says. (Special) >Day Ability 2: Blank - Consume 1 soul. Capture soul will wipe the players journal tonight. You can still read it. (Special) > > Night Ability: Capture soul - Collect a players dying soul. (Unlimited)
Purpose: Anonymous communication > [color = "blue"]**Psychic**[/color] - Blue Dragon Social (Unique) > Passive: Psychic shield - Immune to social day Ability's. > >Day Ability: Telepathy - Send an anonymous message to all players. (3 uses) > > Night Ability 1: Link minds - You can talk to target player anonymously for the rest of the night. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Conduit - Choose 2 players. They can talk to each other for the rest of the night. You can hear but not talk to them. (Unlimited)
> [color = "purple"]**Illusionist**[/color] - Unseen Social (Unique) > Passive: Psychic shield - Immune to social day Ability's > > Day Ability: Telepathy - Send an anonymous message to all players. (3 uses) > > Night Ability 1: Mind warp - Target player receives incorrect feedback tonight. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Mind read - Look at Target players journal. (2 uses)
Purpose: Whisper manipulation > [color = "blue"]**Noble**[/color] - Blue Dragon Social > Passive 1: Royal Blood - You can step up to be king > Passive 2: Espionage - If a hidden negative effect is applied to you then you will know > >Day Ability: Private matters - Whispers to and from you are hidden for the rest of the day. (Unlimited) > >Night Ability 1: Maid Spy - Hear whispers to and from Target player until you choose another player. Does not count as a visit. (Unlimited) > > Night Ability 2: Snoop - You will learn the contents of all whispers from target player yesterday. Cannot target King. (3 uses)
> [color = "purple"]**Aristocrat**[/color] - Blue Dragon Social > Passive 1: Royal Blood - You can step up to be king > Passive 2: Espionage - If a hidden negative effect is applied to you then you will know > >Day Ability 1: Private matters - Whispers to and from you are hidden for the rest of the day. (Unlimited) >Day Ability 2: Misfile - Whispers from target player will fail today. They will think they succeeded. (2 uses) > >Night Ability 1: Maid Spy - Hear whispers to and from Target player until you choose another player. Does not count as a visit. (Unlimited) > > Night Ability 2: Snoop - You will learn the contents of all whispers from target player yesterday. Cannot target King. (3 uses)
Purpose: Vote and trial Manipulation > [color = "blue"]**Merchant**[/color] - Blue Dragon Social > Passive: Bureaucracy - You can see vote contents in real time exept when you are on trial > > Day Ability 1: Bribe - Force one person to accuse another and prevent further voting. (2 uses) > Day Ability 2: Fund - If there is a tie on trial the person is executed. (2 uses) > > Night Ability 1: Bounty - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional trial and execution. Cannot target King. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Overtime - There can be up to 3 trials tomorrow. (1 use)
> [color = "purple"]**Con artist**[/color] - Unseen Social > Passive: Bureaucracy - You can see vote contents in real time exept when you are on trial > > Day Ability 1: Bribe - Force one person to accuse another and prevent further voting. (2 uses) > Day Ability 2: Fund - If there is a tie on trial the person is executed. (2 uses) > > Night Ability 1: Bounty - If target player is executed tomorrow and is Blue Dragon then there will be an additional trial and execution. Cannot target King. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Cease and desist - There can be only 1 trial tomorrow. (1 use)
> [color = "red"]**Apostle**[/color] - cult Social > Passive: Dark words - Dead cult members can talk to the living cult members at night > > Day Ability 1: Project - Send an anonymous message to all players. (2 use) > Day Ability 2: Mind control - Force one person to accuse another and prevent further voting. (2 uses) > >Night Ability 1: Cult spy - Hear whispers to and from Target player until you choose another player. Does not count as a visit. (3 uses) > Night Ability 2: Hypnotize - Target player receive a feedback of your choice. (2 uses)
